name: PixKour
description:
Open-World Platformer

Rotate around the world to find Portals in order to continue next world

Defeat the Boss of each world

Unlock Stronger Weapons and Abilites

(Currently in Prototype so 

(All Weapons can be pick in "Tutorial" and you have only one chance to pick your weapon

(All Abilites are unlocked for publish test

(Have Fun
